name: A Total War Saga: TROY
descr:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1099410/extras/Troy-Header_v3.gif?t=1655289261[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1099410/extras/BRING_TROY_TO_LIFE___SCH.png?t=1655289261[/img]  
在这个传奇的年代中，英雄行走于大地上。特洛伊的王子，鲁莽的帕里斯做出了震惊世界的举动，他和美丽的斯巴达王后私奔了。他们一同乘船逃走后，国王墨涅拉俄斯诅咒着她的名字。他发誓要将妻子带回家来——不管付出怎样的代价。 
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1099410/extras/BECOME_A_LEGEND_SCH.png?t=1655289261[/img] 
扮演八名标志性的英雄之一，为了拯救或征服特洛伊王国而战斗吧，其中包含声名狼藉的战士阿喀琉斯，高贵的守护者赫克托耳，任性的王子帕里斯和复仇的国王墨涅拉俄斯。 
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1099410/extras/Troy-Steam-Hector_v3.gif?t=1655289261[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1099410/extras/TURN_THE_TIDE_OF_WAR_SCH.png?t=1655289261[/img]
带领军队穿过传说中爱琴海周边的土地，征募以希腊神话中的神奇生物为原型的特殊部队，杀入战场与凶暴的敌人作战。 
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1099410/extras/Troy-Steam-City_v3.gif?t=1655289261[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1099410/extras/BUILD_A_BRONZE_AGE_EMPIRE_SCH.png?t=1655289261[/img]
通过战略、内政、外交与全面战争建立你的帝国，征服青铜时代辽阔而令人神往的地中海。 
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1099410/extras/Troy-Steam-Game-View_v3.gif?t=1655289261[/img]
